name: Torsk
paper: Adaptive Anomaly Detection in Chaotic Time Series with a Spatially Aware Echo State Network
description: Extension of the Echo State Network by adding spatially aware input maps, such as convolutions, gradients, cosine transforms, as well as a spatially aware loss function. The spatial ESN is used to create predictions which reduce the detection problem to thresholding of the prediction error.
bibtex: @misc{heim2019adaptiveanomalydetectionchaotic,title={Adaptive Anomaly Detection in Chaotic Time Series with a Spatially Aware Echo State Network}, author={Niklas Heim and James E. Avery},year={2019},eprint={1909.01709},archivePrefix={arXiv},primaryClass={cs.NE},}
